facilitator_artifacts.stakeholder_engagement_matrix: 9 key stakeholders identified with engagement strategies
facilitator_artifacts.problem_statement: Clear business pain and motivation documented with success criteria
facilitator_artifacts.scope_definition: Comprehensive scope in/out analysis with assumptions and constraints
facilitator_artifacts.as_is_analysis: Current state processes, systems, and risks identified

consolidator_artifacts.to_be_design: Complete target state architecture with 7-dimension gap analysis
consolidator_artifacts.data_systems_impact: 5 data elements and 5 systems analyzed with integration requirements
consolidator_artifacts.acceptance_criteria: 10 SMART criteria covering all functional requirements with validation methods
consolidator_artifacts.consolidated_document_structure: 9-section project definition document ready for finalization

sections: 1. Executive Summary - Strategic initiative overview with ROI metrics
2. Project Overview - Problem statement and business justification
3. Stakeholder Analysis - 9 stakeholder engagement matrix with communication plan
4. Scope Definition - 12 in-scope components, 10 out-of-scope exclusions, assumptions and constraints
5. Current State Analysis - As-is processes and problem areas identification
6. Future State Design - To-be model with 7-dimension gap analysis
7. Impact Assessment - Data and system impact analysis with integration requirements
8. Success Criteria - 10 SMART acceptance criteria with validation methods
9. Appendices - Traceability matrix and stakeholder sign-offs

quality_assurance_checklist.content_integration: Passed - All artifacts integrated via traceability matrix

v0_1_consolidation.executive_summary: Strategic questionnaire management system initiative. ROI: 80% reduction in template creation time, 90% reduction in errors. Investment in centralized web-based admin platform with AD integration for operational efficiency and compliance.

review_distribution: IT Development Team - Technical feasibility and architecture review - 5 days
Security/Compliance Team - Security and compliance validation - 5 days
Business Analysts - Requirements validation and completeness - 5 days
Quality Assurance Team - Testing approach validation - 5 days
